profile:
PMT Home Services has serviced the GTA with windows and eavestrough (gutter) cleaning and repairs since 2008 with higher standards and lower prices than our competitors. The owner, Philip is heavily involved in day-to-day operations ensuring every house is up to our clients’ satisfaction.

We are currently welcoming our new clients with an unbeatable price. We look forward to meeting with you soon to further discuss our services! 


Services we provide:
-Eavestrough/Soffit/Fascia Installation
-Eavestrough (Gutter) Cleaning 
-Eavestrough (Gutter) Repairs
-Downspout Disconnection 
-Pressure Washing
-Window Cleaning (Interior/Exterior)
-LED Light Bulbs Replacement
-Painting/Staining decks
and more






--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

profile:
Welcome to Ecosparkle - Your Green Clean Team. We’re an independent, locally owned business based in Newmarket, Ontario – and a 6-year straight Reader’s Choice winner. We proudly offer sustainable, Eco-friendly, synthetic chemical-free natural and organic cleaning solutions to homes & businesses within the entire York Region and Greater Toronto Areas, including: Newmarket, Aurora, Bradford, East Gwillimbury, King City, Richmond Hill, Stoufville, Markham, Vaughan, Uxbridge, Oakville, Mississauga, North York, Etobicoke and Downtown Toronto. 
 
Request your free Green Clean Quote today!

profile:
Fresh Glance Cleaning Services is a family-owned operated business that serves in the GTA and surrounding areas. We are a well-established company that has earned a reputation as one of the most reasonably priced, thorough, hardworking, and friendly window cleaning companies in the area. Fresh Glance strive to provide our clients the best window cleaning services that meet and exceed their expectations. We specialize in residential, luxurious estate homes, commercial, and industrial properties. Fresh Glance uses the highest quality products and tools to achieve the best results for every client. We approach each job with the highest attention to detail and technology, making their clients satisfy their number one priority. We want you to love the appearance of your home, that is why we strive to make sure every client is 100% satisfied.
We guarantee our work.
We fully comply with Health and Safety regulations In Ontario. Fresh Glance Cleaning Services is fully insured.

profile:
Experience 5-star customer service done right. We provide our clients with the best professional and high-quality window cleaning, power washing, and gutter cleaning services. Our technicians will show up to your home or business ready to carry out your service call with professional equipment and tools.

Exterior window cleaning is done by top-notch carbon fiber, water-fed pole, specialized squeegee, and filtered water to ensure shine of the windows. Our interior window cleaning service is done by hand – we use the classic applicator and squeegee method. We can also clean skylights, solariums and screens to make your property shine.
